FAILSAFE: Triggered when safety criteria are violated (e.g., RC loss, low battery).
GPSGLITCH: Indicates a sudden loss of GPS lock or poor signal quality.
EKF_CHECK-2: Extended Kalman Filter check failed: inconsistent sensor data.
BARO-1: Barometer sensor 1 out of range or disconnected.
GCS_FAILSAFE: Ground control signal lost, initiating failsafe procedure.
CRASH_CHECK-1: Crash detection triggered due to rapid deceleration.
